name: The Very Short Game With The Incredibly Scary Monster
name_original: The Very Short Game With The Incredibly Scary Monster
description:
WARNING:

If your game displays a message along the lines of "RGSS-RTP Standard Not Found", you will need to download the RTP from the official RPG Maker website, found here (Specifically RPG Maker XP's RTP.)

You shouldn't have to, but if you do, there's the resource. Anyway...

This game is VERY SHORT!!!

AND HAS A SCARY MONSTER!!!!

That's actually the gist of it. It's just a short game I whipped up in a few hours for no particular reason. It's mostly just text.
